examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
"status":"SUCCESS",
"result":
 {
     "comment" :[{
     "id": "1",
     "comment": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit",
     "created_at": "2016-02-24 10:00",
     "profile_id": 1,
     "username": "john",

     "preview": "http:\/\/www.cliquenet.com\/video.png",
     "type": "VIDEO"
     }],
     "profile_name" : "John",
     "post": {
          "post_id": 1,
          "description": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.",
          "profile_id": 2
          "profile_name": "John",
          "date": "2016-02-24 10:30:00",
          "media": [
             {
                 "id": 1,
                 "photo": "http:\/\/www.cliquenet.com\/photo.jpg",
                 "video": "",
                 "preview": "",
                 "text": "",
                 "link": ""
                 "type": "PHOTO",
                 "order": 1
             }
          ]
     }
 },
 "error":''
}
